subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: FIFA has given itself just three weeks to root out any corrupt men from its executive committee, and then three weeks more to determine the multibillion-dollar destinations for the World Cups of 2018 and 2022.
snippet: FIFA has given itself just three weeks to root out any corrupt men from its executive committee, and then three weeks more to determine the multibillion-dollar destinations for the World Cups of 2018 and 2022.
